dict.acceptation: 股份，股票；库存；树干；家畜；

sent.orig: Consider, for example, inventory file. It contains all the data elements from the data store STOCK.
sent.trans: 以货物清单文件为例，它包含来自stock的所有数据元素。

sent.orig: A data store, STOCK, holds data on each item in inventory.
sent.trans: stock保存货单中每项商品的数据。

sent.orig: Beef Stock, Chicken Stock, Fish Stock Stock made from purely vegetables is a Vegetable Stock.
sent.trans: 如牛肉汤，鸡汤，鱼汤，完全由蔬菜制成的蔬菜汤。

sent.orig: Audit the stock discrepancies of warehouse. for the stock adjustment in system and random stock inspection.
sent.trans: 审核大仓库存差异，负责系统内库存的调整，并对大仓库存负责抽查。

sent.orig: Listed on Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited Stock Exchange in 1997 (Stock Code: 178) .
sent.trans: 莎莎于一九九七年在香港联合交易所有限公司（联交所）上市（股份代号：178)。
